patthana3.5:1.1: Nosaññojanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:2.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:4.1: Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano akusalo ca nosaññojano akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:5.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:6.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:8.1: Saññojano akusalo dhammo saññojanassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:9.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:13.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.5:14.1: Nosaññojanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:15.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:17.1: Saññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.5:18.1: Asaññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:20.1: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukagamanaṃ, evaṃ imampi ñātabbaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.5:21.1: Saññojaniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:22.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:24.1: Saññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.5:25.1: Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato ca asaññojaniyo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana3.5:26.1: Saññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca asaññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.5:27.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:29.1: Saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana3.5:30.1: Asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo asaññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:31.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:32.1: Saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:36.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.5:37.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:38.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:40.1: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:41.1: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:42.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ, anulomaṃ.)
patthana3.5:43.1: Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho. Saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. (2) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:44.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca …pe… nakamme tīṇi …pe… navippayutte pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ, paccanīyaṃ.)
patthana3.5:45.1: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana3.5:46.1: Saññojanavippayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana3.5:47.1: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana3.5:48.1: Saññojanasampayutto akusalo dhammo saññojanasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:49.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:50.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:51.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:53.1: Saññojaniyañceva no ca saññojanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo ceva no ca saññojano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:54.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:56.1: Saññojanañceva saññojaniyañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:57.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:58.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:60.1: Saññojano ceva saññojaniyo ca akusalo dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojaniyassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:61.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:65.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.5:66.1: Saññojaniyañceva no ca saññojanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojaniyo ceva no ca saññojano abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:67.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:69.1: Saññojanañceva saññojanasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:70.1: Saññojanasampayuttañceva no ca saññojanaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanasampayutto ceva no ca saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.5:71.1: Saññojanañceva saññojanasampayuttaṃ akusalañca saññojanasampayuttañceva no ca saññojanaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:72.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:73.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:75.1: Saññojano ceva saññojanasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo saññojanassa ceva saññojanasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:76.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:77.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:80.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.5:81.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.5:82.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.5:83.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:84.1: (Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukasadisaṃ. Sahajātavāropi …pe… pañhāvāropi sabbattha vitthāretabbā.)
patthana3.5:85.1: Saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo akusalo dhammo saññojanavippayuttassa saññojaniyassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:87.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.5:88.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato ca saññojanavippayutto asaññojaniyo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana3.5:89.1: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ saññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca saññojanavippayuttaṃ asaññojaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:90.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane ekaṃ, kamme pañca, vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:91.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme ekaṃ, navipāke ekaṃ, navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:93.1: Saññojanavippayutto saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojanavippayuttassa saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:94.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.5:98.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
